thread.title: FIFA 17's latest goals of the week compilation contains filthiest solo goal yet
thread.title_full: FIFA 17's latest goals of the week compilation contains filthiest solo goal yet

author: Thomas Bristow
title: FIFA 17's latest goals of the week compilation contains filthiest solo goal yet
text:
FIFA 17's latest goals of the week compilation contains filthiest solo goal yet The best part is, he's capable of doing this in real life Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Scorpion kicks, rabonas and 5-star skills Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
We've seen some pretty spectacular goals from you FIFA players from over the years - but the one in the video above takes the absolute biscuit. 
Just to clarify, we're not talking about Willian's stunning edge of the box scorpion kick goal. Nor are we talking about Antoine Griezmann's self set-up volley, or Yevhen Konoplyanka's outrageous free-kick. 
We're talking about the second goal in the above compilation - Hatem Ben Arfa's filthy solo goal. 
Just thank the gamer who goes by the name 'Wolf Pack'. Cuadrado's fine effort (Photo: EA SPORTS FIFA/Youtube) Konoplyanka's disgusting free-kick (Photo: EA SPORTS FIFA/Youtube) 
Picking up the ball outside the box, Wolf Pack beats three players using FIFA 17 skill to work his way into the area. 
Ben Arfa then scoops the ball over an unsuspecting fourth defender before smashing his effort on the volley into the back of the net. Ben Arfa's filthy solo goal (Photo: EA SPORTS FIFA/Youtube) poll loading Is this the best FIFA 17 goal you've ever seen? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
